body_html:
The regular ascii kind you have elsewhere :)

Some text editors, especially on Mac, will "helpfully" replace straight quotes ("") with the curly unicode ones: (“”). Can lead to some pretty devious issues... you might try and find the setting that caused this so it doesn't happen again.

https://www.cl.cam.ac.uk/~mgk25/ucs/quotes.html

body:
The regular ascii kind you have elsewhere :)

Some text editors, especially on Mac, will "helpfully" replace straight quotes ("") with the curly unicode ones: (“”). Can lead to some pretty devious issues... you might try and find the setting that caused this so it doesn't happen again.

https://www.cl.cam.ac.uk/~mgk25/ucs/quotes.html
